Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ] Application Guide Application Guide [PDF ]

Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:56:30 UTC – Details)


Quick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a powerful car phone mount magnetic system for conveniently mounting your smartphone, cell phone or larger smart devices to the dashboard in your vehicle, office, workshop, boat or RV. Lock your cell phone or device in place with this Scosche dash mount car holder featuring a 4-Axis adjustable ball joint neck with lock for optimal viewing at any angle. The integrated cable clips let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the magnetic phone car mount to keep cables from obstructing your view. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your phone magnet near the phone magnetic mount surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful N50 neodymium magnets are very strong magnetic car phone mounts and are still 100% safe for modern smartphones and devices. The low-profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the automotive grade base to ensure optimal holding power. Compliment your cell phone automobile accessories with this car phone holder.
Magnetic Phone Holder – Comes with powerful Rare-Earth neodymium phone magnets that provide a secure grip to your iPhone, Android or Tablet. 100% mobile device safe. Simply stick the car mount magnet to the back of your phone case for a secure magnet hold.
Optimal Viewing – With 4-axis, 360-degree adjustable head and enhanced soft touch rubber lock-nut, this magnetic car mount allows viewing from any angle. Provides a great hands free experience.
Convenient Design – Integrated cable clip secures the charging cable to our car cell phone holder for a clean mount. The cradle-free design permits safe, easy one-handed use and access to all controls and ports.
Dashboard Accessories Included – phone mount, MagicPlates, protective film and user manual
Buy with Confidence – Backed by Scosche’s Lifetime Tech Support and 3-year Warranty

Secure this mount onto any firm, flat and clean surface area

Does not interfere with wireless charging when using the proper MagicPlate placement

The heat resistant automotive grade mounting base will safely secure a Smartphone in your car, home or office

Read more

item.title: HOTO Precision Electric Screwdriver Set, 25 in 1 Magnetic Driver Bits Set, Rechargeable Screwdriver Tool Set, S2 Steel, Repair Tool Kit for Precision Electronics
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)



HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every bit is machined with high precision to avoid damaging the screw. Specially used for precision object disassembly, such as repairing computers/tablets/game consoles/cameras/watches, etc.
ADVANCED APPEARANCE: Extremely textured aluminum alloy frosted appearance, bringing you a delicate touch. Electric screwdriver dark gray appearance design brings advanced visual experience. Aluminum shell surface treated with anodic oxidization, anti-sweat, and anti-corrosion. PC+ABS high-strength engineering plastic shell bottom, sturdy and durable. Stylish, high-end precision screwdriver set is the perfect gift.
BUILT-IN MAGNETIZER MAGNETIZATION ANY TIME: The storage box has an integrated magnetization area design, which can be magnetized at any time for the equipped bits and any screwdrivers to better absorb precision screws. The practical magnetic design aims to save time and effort. Small torque setting keeps you from over-tightening screws. HOTO useful precision screwdriver set is a decent gift for both professional and amateur.
EASY USE & PORTABLE MAGNETIC BOX: HOTO electric screwdriver with all-aluminum alloy non-slip shell, surface three-dimensional texture design, make the grip more stable and less slippery. The front end of the screwdriver has a built-in magnet, and the batch head is magnetically installed for quick replacement. One-button start design, easy to use, even users with zero experience can easily operate. TPU soft rubber material buttons, provide a comfortable feel.
TYPE-C & PORTABLE BOX: Type-C charging port, suitable for charging cables of various electronic products, enabling charging anytime, anywhere. Comes with a storage box, lightweight and compact design makes it easy to put in a bag and carry outdoors. The magnetic design makes it much easier to use and prevents the loss of the bit. Precision screwdriver built-in 350mAh lithium battery with long battery life. The battery can punch 500 screws once fully charged.

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $26.99 - $22.29
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:40 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Since its inception in 2013, SHOWPIN has been synonymous with quality, innovation, efficiency and value.

As a manufacturer of professional repair tools, we integrate R&D, manufacturing and sales, are committed to designing and manufacturing product that meet our customers’ needs and provide them with reliable products. Our product sold all over North America, Japan, Europe.

Our thinking: bring small but beautiful changes to life through repair.

Precision Screwdriver Set

Household & Electronics Repair

Mini screwdriver set

Make it easy to repair

【Powerful Functions】122 in 1 precision screwdriver set contains 98 screwdriver bits, 3TorxTR screwdriver bits and 21 auxiliary tools, such as screwdriver handle, flexible shaft, extension rod, magnetizer, magnetic pad, cleaning brush etc. Own this toolkit, you can replace the battery, screen and other parts of the smartphone, tablet, laptop, and upgrade the hard disk and performance of the computer and PC, disassemble and repair PS4, Xbox and other game consoles, repair drones, cameras, etc.
【Practical Repair Tool】This electronic screwdriver set is professionally designed to maximize your repair ability. The screwdriver handle is ergonomically designed, with non-slip particles outside, easy to exert force and rotate smoothly; the 4.56 inch alloy steel extension rod has high hardness, not easy to bend, suitable for narrow gaps; 5.11 inch flexible shaft is composed of CRV springs , which can be bent 180° and rotated 360°, helping you easily deal with complex disassembly environments.
【Quality First】The screwdriver bits in this laptop repair tool kit are made of Cr-V Steel, after high temperature treatment process, the hardness can reach 60HRC, stronger and not easy to damage, suitable for long-term use for repairing Electronics. This computer repair kit is equipped with spare bits for frequently used models( such as phillips, slot, tri-point) to avoid the need to find a new bit or replace a new screwdriver set if the bit is lost or damaged.
【With Professional Storage Case and Magnetizer】This computer tool kit comes with a shockproof plastic storage box, each screwdriver bit is well placed in the corresponding slot, easy to find and store. The included magnetizer can easily enhance the magnetic properties of the screwdriver bit. The 5.7*3.3 inch magnetic pad can absorb small screws and tiny metal parts, no worry about losing screws, or damage electronic components due to strong magnetism.
【Excellent Service】This screwdriver repair kit provides a 90-day refund and lifetime warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution within 24 hours. This screwdriver set is designed for disassembled and installation, even an amateur can easily repair electronic devices, making it a great Christmas gift for your husband, father, son or friend, bring them the surprise and fun of maintenance.


Premium Bits

These bits are precisely CNC machined, manufactured from high quality chrome vanadium steel that reduce rust, corrosion and abrasions giving you exact fit and long lasting service.

Precision Screwdriver Set

101 Screwdriver Bits and 21 Repair Tools

21 Repair Tools：Plastic Opening Tools, ESD Tweezers, SIM Card Ejector Pin, LCD Suction Cup, Triangle Opening Pry Tool, Plastic Spudgers, Magnetizing and Demagnetizing Tool and etc.

  • Computers and iMac
  • Laptops and Macbook
  • Tablet and iPads
  • iPhone and Android Phones
  • Game Consoles
  • Home Appliances
  • And More…

Read more

Pozidriv PZ000, PZ00, PZ0, PZ1, PZ2

Hexagon H0.7,H0.9,H1.0,H1.3,H1.5,H2.0,H2.5,H3.0,H3.5,H4.0,H4.5

Special Type S2 TorxTR: T6H,T8H,T10H, MID: 2.5, PH2, SIM: 0.8, Mini Torx:MT3.8,MT4.5

【Practical Repair Tool】This electronic screwdriver set is professionally designed to maximize your repair ability. The screwdriver handle is ergonomically designed, with non-slip particles outside, easy to exert force and rotate smoothly; the 4.56 inch alloy steel extension rod has high hardness, not easy to bend, suitable for narrow gaps; 5.11 inch flexible shaft is composed of CRV springs , which can be bent 180° and rotated 360°, helping you easily deal with complex disassembly environments.
【Quality First】The screwdriver bits in this laptop repair tool kit are made of Cr-V Steel, after high temperature treatment process, the hardness can reach 60HRC, stronger and not easy to damage, suitable for long-term use for repairing Electronics. This computer repair kit is equipped with spare bits for frequently used models( such as phillips, slot, tri-point) to avoid the need to find a new bit or replace a new screwdriver set if the bit is lost or damaged.
【With Professional Storage Case and Magnetizer】This computer tool kit comes with a shockproof plastic storage box, each screwdriver bit is well placed in the corresponding slot, easy to find and store. The included magnetizer can easily enhance the magnetic properties of the screwdriver bit. The 5.7*3.3 inch magnetic pad can absorb small screws and tiny metal parts, no worry about losing screws, or damage electronic components due to strong magnetism.
【Excellent Service】This screwdriver repair kit provides a 90-day refund and lifetime warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution within 24 hours. This screwdriver set is designed for disassembled and installation, even an amateur can easily repair electronic devices, making it a great Christmas gift for your husband, father, son or friend, bring them the surprise and fun of maintenance.


Premium Bits

These bits are precisely CNC machined, manufactured from high quality chrome vanadium steel that reduce rust, corrosion and abrasions giving you exact fit and long lasting service.

Precision Screwdriver Set

101 Screwdriver Bits and 21 Repair Tools

21 Repair Tools：Plastic Opening Tools, ESD Tweezers, SIM Card Ejector Pin, LCD Suction Cup, Triangle Opening Pry Tool, Plastic Spudgers, Magnetizing and Demagnetizing Tool and etc.

  • Computers and iMac
  • Laptops and Macbook
  • Tablet and iPads
  • iPhone and Android Phones
  • Game Consoles
  • Home Appliances
  • And More…

【COOL GADGETS GIFTS】：Great gifts Ideas with exquisite tool bag made of oxford fabric and gift wrapping is the best friend gift or for your loved person on holidays.Cool stocking stuffers for men, valentines day gifts for men, birthday gifts for dad, boyfriend , women
【POWERFUL MAGNET】Maximum suction weight up to 5lb, easily find and grab lost items in hard to reach areas, helpful when working in automobiles, construction, HVAC and other home projects. Note: the amount of suction is related to the contact area and location of the absorbent article
【TELESCOPING HANDLE】Made from aluminum alloy, making tools shockproof. Handles extend up to 34.65inch, help to grab lost items in far to reach areas. Anti-slip, oil-resistant plastic coating and ergonomic design, provides comfortable grip and more effortless use.
【SUPER BRIGHT FLASHLIGHT】3 super bright LED bulbs, Magnet head and base, 360°swivel neck, 2.5lb maximum suction weight with extended 2″ stainless steel pocket clip help to illuminate and grab tools in dark narrow places.
【360° ROTATION ROUND & SQUARE INSPECTION MIRRORS】Made from premium-quality glass for perfect reflection, all-angled ball joint holds mirrors for 360 degree free viewing and keeps it from swinging, square mirror has LED lights facilitate inspection of dark areas.
【COMPACT PORTABLE TOOL BAG】Small size carries wealth of tools, easy to carry. Made of Oxford cloth, resist to wear and tear. Extended hand strap design, easy to carry and store. Additional pocket with hook and loop fasteners on the bag for gathering tools conveniently. Separate elastic band inside, help to organize.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $26.99 - $20.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:34:53 UTC – Details)

Product Description

STREBITO 124-Piece Electronic Repair Kit

Strive to Be Great

STREBITO is Esperanto for “strive”, which epitomizes our attitude and ambition: Make a better world with our products. We are a rising global manufacturer dedicated to making the finest hand tools , providing quality products and striving to create the best experience from purchasing through to using.

Professional Repair Tool Kit

101 bits and 23 repair tools

101 Precision Bits: Phillips, Slotted, Torx, Tamper-Resistant Torx, Pentalobe, Pozidriv, Tri Point, Hex, Gamebit, Square, Socket, etc.

23 Repair Tools: Flexible Shaft, Suction Cup with SIM Card Eject Pin, ESD Tweezers, Magnetizer, Magnetic Mat, Plastic Pry Tool, Opening Picks, Brush, Microfiber Cloths, etc.

Cell Phone Computer Laptop and Macbook Game Controller and Console Watch and Smart Watch RC Toy Home Appliances ..And More

Upgraded Design

Premium Bits

All 4 mm bits are CNC machined, which is more precision. And the material is CRV Steel, sturdy and durable, which can ensure long time use.

Magnetic Bit Holder

The bit holder has a built-in strong magnet, holds bits securely and transmits magnetism, keeps fasteners firmly in place.

Ergonomic Handles

Bit driver handle is ergonomically shaped for maximum comfort while working and particle grip for non slip handling.

Swivel Cap

Super smooth swivel cap allows you to apply constant pressure while turning and helps reduce hand fatigue.

Extension Shaft and Flexible Shaft

Improved Access

Extended Design enables access to restricted areas where a traditional screwdriver wouldn’t fit.

Versatile Tool Set

Maximize Your Repair Capabilities

Every tool in this repair kit has been specially designed and selected by our technicians to tackle any job, such as taking apart, opening, cleaning, assembling, building and maintaining.

STREBITO Toolkit, Give You More Possibility

Quantity
101 x 4mmBits, 23 x Repair Tools 120 x 4mm Bits, 22 x Repair Tools 1 x Stubby Ratchet, 30 x 1/4 Bits, 1 x Bit Extension 6 x Reversible Driver, 2 x Precision Drive, 8 x Mini Torx L Key, 1 x Magnetizer Tool 120 x 4mm Bits, 44 x 1/4 Bits, 22 x Repair Tools

Application
Electronics repairs — PC, laptop, iPhone, PS5/4/3, xbox, nintendo, glasses and more Electronics repairs — computer, laptop, smartphone, tablet, gaming, watch, camera and more Automotive, industrial, construction, cycling and DIY applications in tight spaces DIY, home maintenance, furniture assembly, domestic appliances, automotive, bike and more Electronics, household, furniture, automotive, commercial, industrial, electrical, and much more

Bits Material
CRV Steel CRV Steel CRV Steel CRV Steel CRV Steel

Package
Plastic Case Oxford Bag ABS+PP Case Zipper Bag Oxford Bag

1.29 lb 1.58 lb 0.74 lb 1.46 lb 2.63 lb

Size
7.1 x 3.9 x 2.1 in 8.6 x 5.5 x 1.5 in 4.7 x 2.9 x 1.2 in 9.4 x 7.8 x 1.4 in 8.8 x 6.7 x 2.5 in

【Variety & Versatility】STREBITO 124 electronic screwdriver set includes 101 precision bits, complete with every driver head you’ll need to repair any electronics, such as Apple & Android mobile phone, PC, laptop, iPhone, Mac, Nintendo, PlayStation 5/4/3, Xbox series game console & controller, tablet, iPad, RC toys, watch, eyeglass, etc. This is the do-everything toolkit every DIYer, fixer, IT geek, professional tech and hobbyist needs, also a decent gift for your family, friends, colleagues, etc
【Superior in Quality】These 4mm precision bits are made of premium Chrome Vanadium Steel which hardness can reach 60HRC, so the tips are sturdy, durable and not easily stripped, ensure long product lifespan. The bits are precisely CNC machined to be accurate. And every bit is engraved part number and size for fast recognition. In addition, this screwdriver bit set gives you duplicates for the most commonly used bits in case one gets lost
【Precision Tool Kit】This computer tool kit offers maximum utility with 23 practical repair tools. Magnetizer Demagnetizer Tool helps magnetize bits to grab screws, or demagnetize it to safely work on sensitive electronic devices. ESD Tweezers handle screws and micro parts easily while Magnetic Mat can keep them organized, preventing from losing. Opening Tools are used for prying, sliding and opening. Brush and Cloths are perfect for cleaning the fan and screen of your device
【Innovation Design】 We have professionally designed this laptop screwdriver kit for maximum humanization, make your repair job easier and more efficient. The screwdriver features a non-slip grip and rubberized, ergonomic handle with swivel top, provides a comfortable grip and smoothly spinning. Magnetic bit holder transmits magnetism through the bit, helping you handle tiny screws. And flexible extension shaft is 360° bendable, perfect for removing fastener in tight spots
【Portable & Reliable】This phone repair tool kit comes in a compact hard plastic case, it’s easy to carry out, or placed in home, car, tool box/bag and drawer. All tools are well stored, offering a whole protection, no more worry about losing and messing up. What’s more, this electronic repair kit is covered by STREBITO’s lifetime warranty and 30 days money-back. If you have any issues with your tool set, simply contact customer service for troubleshooting help, parts, replacement, or refund
